1425680.name: Secret of The Lost Keys Demo
1425680.description:
Take the role of Captain Keysis in his quest to defeat Dark Magician Reg who is trying to take control of the Land of Disred. Embark into a magical adventure in the first episode of a trilogy. Find your way across the levels searching the magical lost keys, collecting items, avoiding traps, and fighting powerful enemies in a classic-style platformer game! Do you think you can discover the "Secret"?

THIS DEMO ONLY INCLUDES THE FIRST 3 LEVELS OF THE GAME

Key Features


  • Run across 16 levels in 4 different worlds!
  • Search for secret rooms and items
  • Great replay value thanks to a exciting ranking system implemented in each stage
  • Finish the game with a perfect rank to unlock the true ending!
1425680.supported_languages: 英语, 西班牙语 - 拉丁美洲
